TopicTitle: i need help with a mod.

Articles.Content: i was wondering if any could get damned robotics to work with ksp 21.1. i loved that mod, i used it alot and i used it for epic mun rover transport things.

Yep. You need the new plugin, and the versions of the parts from here:

https://github.com/sirkut/InfernalRobotics
